resources.string: Please answer the quiz questions to find out how healthy is Your weekly diet!
You should drink %s l of water every day.
Do You drink that much water every day?
You are doing good for Your health!
You should try to drink more water every day for Your own health.
Which product You ate most of all this week? Choose one or few!
Vegetables is a really good choice. Just remember, that healthy diet is balanced diet.
Fruits are good choice for desert, but there is much sugar in them, so be careful and consider replacing some fruits with veggies. And do not forget about balance in everything!
Fast food should not be Your most frequent choice. Leave it just for rare special occasions.
You should add more vegetables and fruits to Your diet for it to be balanced.
Milk products are good for Your health, but vegetables should take the first place. Balance is a key to everything.
Meat is good for Your body, because it contains ferrum and proteins, but vegetables should full two times bigger part in Your dish than meat. and remember - meat does not replace fish.
Fish is really good choice and everyone should eat it at least 3 times a week, but do not forget about vegetables!
